<OPTGROUP>rocks</OPTGROUP>
<OPTGROUP>this</OPTGROUP>
<OPTGROUP>rocks</OPTGROUP>
<OPTGROUP>this</OPTGROUP>

<OPTGROUP>rocks</OPTGROUP>
